products.name: Peace lily(indoor plant)
products.desc: If you want to grow a low-care flowering houseplant, grow peace lily! Peace lilyâ€™s beautiful white bracts and tiny flowers flourish in low lighting conditions.

products.name: Begonia
products.desc: Begonia  are among the best and most popular houseplants

products.name: Bromeliads
products.desc: They thrive easily without much care and thrive in low-light conditions as well.

products.name: Croton
products.desc: Croton is one of the best plants to display red with different hues. Do make sure that the plant gets 3-4 hours of sun for that pop of colors!

products.name: Geranium
products.desc: It requires a south or west-facing window that receives ample sun and moderate watering.

products.name: Poinsettia
products.desc: Growing poinsettias in your home can add a bright touch to your interior. Its multicolor bracts look more colorful than its flowers.

products.name: Lipstick Plant
products.desc: Although not commonly grown as a houseplant, lipstick plants can be grown indoors. It requires a constantly warm temperature and humid surroundings to thrive.

products.name: Madagascar Dragon Tree
products.desc: Though the plant stays and looks green, give it a good sun exposure, and it will gift you with stunning red foliage. Avoid keeping it in the harsh afternoon sun for long.
